title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS – Toyota Prado 2006-2009 3.0L 120s 1KD-FTV w/wo: ABS – ProVent Oil Catch Can Kit

content.rendered:
MANN+HUMMEL’s ProVent 200 Kit OS-PROV-18 suits:

Toyota LC Prado (mid2006-2009) 3.0L TD

Turbo Diesel KDJ 120R Series 1KD-FTV Engines

** With or without ABS

MANN+HUMMEL’s ProVent Catch Can

ProVent is the newest innovation for crankcase ventilation. Also known as a Catch Can, it is specifically designed to accommodate the latest generation of turbo-charged engines and has the following advantages over existing solutions.

• Highly efficient oil separation providing ideal protection for

the turbocharger and other components installed downstream

• Low pressure loss • Less motor oil consumption in comparison

to less efficient separators or conventional open systems

• Maintenance friendly:

fittings are not removed during element maintenance

• Universal usage: exceptional for variable flow rates

• Integrated safety feature against irregularly high crankcase

pressure • Compact design • Light and robust design

• No electrical energy required • Low running costs

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Stainless Steel Bracket

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

Download Installation Instructions >

Click to view individual replacement parts

Mann Provent 200 Fitting Accessories >
